description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. 360 Mega App Pack HD features a number of fun and useful applications.  In Rumble Lounge you can choose from one of our relaxing preset massages or try a custom massage session. Other applications include Ultra Clock, Omega Calculator, and more.  Also included are Super Button Mashing Bros (an 8-bit button mashing classic), Arrow Panic (a multiplayer action strategy game), and Memory Masters.
